content:
dicej opened PR #11795 from bytecodealliance:fix-11781 to bytecodealliance:main:

This was left over from an earlier version of the spec, and I forgot to remove it.

I've updated the tests/component-model submodule to pull in the new wait-during-callback.wast test to exercise this scenario.

Fixes 11781

    this can be brief.

dicej edited PR #11795:

This was left over from an earlier version of the spec, and I forgot to remove it.

I've updated the tests/component-model submodule to pull in the new wait-during-callback.wast test to exercise this scenario.

Fixes #11781
